title: Asian noodle salad

default: 100g/3½oz noodles, cooked according to packet instructions
½ mango, peeled, stone removed, diced
1 red chilli, seeds removed, finely chopped
salt and freshly ground black pepper

steps: Toss the cooked noodles with the olive oil in a large serving bowl.
Add the rest of the ingredients, toss together and season before serving.
